mapper.sql: uuid, userName, password, name, sex, age, idNo, phone, email, address, photo, eduBackground, department, title, role, state
mapper.select:
select * from t_user where 1=1
and userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName},'%' )
and name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%' )
and sex = #{sex}
and phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone},'%' )
and department LIKE CONCAT('%', #{department},'%' )
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uuid, userName, password, name, sex, age, idNo, phone, email, address, photo, eduBackground, department, title, role, state, description) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eduBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_user
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idNo = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eduBackground = #{eduBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_user set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idNo = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eduBackground = #{eduBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
